Quote.Text: Marriage lets you annoy one special person for the rest of your life.
Marriage is not just spiritual communion, it is also remembering to take out the trash.
The great marriages are partnerships. It can’t be a great marriage without being a partnership.
A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.

So it’s not gonna be easy. It’s going to be really hard; we’re gonna have to work at this everyday, but I want to do that because I want you. I want all of you, forever, everyday. You and me… everyday.
May this marriage be full of laughter, our every day in paradise.
A happy marriage is a long conversation which always seems too short.
All that I ever wanted was to just hear music, and when I met you, I heard you. And, Rachel, you're the most beautiful thing I've ever heard. Thank you for marrying me.
I have a love in my life. It makes me stronger than anything you can imagine.

It was a million tiny little things that, when you added them all up, they meant we were supposed to be together, and I knew it. I knew it the very first time I touched her. It was like coming home, only to no home I'd ever known. I was just taking her hand to help her out of a car and I knew. It was like magic.
He stepped down, trying not to look long at her, as if she were the sun, yet he saw her, like the sun, even without looking.
It doesn’t matter if the guy is perfect or the girl is perfect, as long as they are perfect for each other.
In my opinion, the best thing you can do is find someone who loves you for exactly what you are. Good mood, bad mood, ugly, pretty, handsome, what have you.

So how does it happen, great love? Nobody knows… but what I can tell you is that it happens in the blink of an eye. One moment you’re enjoying your life, and the next you’re wondering how you ever lived without them.
It could have happened lots of ways. But this is the way it happened. This is the path we took. This is our story.
Quote.Source: Jenny Han, P.S. I Still Love You
